message: Successfully fetched 4 PRs for user moht-agrawal-rubrik

data.title: PR #97449: Add RBAC test for the bulk secondary register host
data.long_summary:
Modified 10 files. (+212/-10 lines). - tests

Key changes:
• polaris/src/rubrik/api-server/app/services/physicalhost/rbac/BUILD.bazel: Added dependencies on proto_deps and common-scala to the rkscala_library build target
• polaris/src/rubrik/sdk_internal/grpc/physicalhost_pb2_grpc.py: Updated docstring for BulkRegisterSecondaryHosts method to include parameter description and removed TODO comment.
• polaris/src/rubrik/api-server/test/app/services/physicalhost/rbac/BUILD.bazel: Added Bazel test target for physicalhost RBAC Scala tests with required dependencies and JVM config

Author: moht-agrawal-rubrik, State: open, Reviewers: 3
action_items: Clarify which output is being referenced in Comment 2 regarding the proto comments mismatch.
Confirm whether the string_to_uuid transform should be applied and if it will function as expected in this context.
Respond to the question in Comment 4 about the necessity of calling fetcher for the RBAC check.
Double-check if passing "UNSPECIFIED" or *EMPTY_VALUE for HostRegisterOsType is needed, and update the code if not required.
Consider providing benchmarking data or further justification regarding the performance discussion in Comment 6.

data.title: PR #97821: Send audits for failed secondary host registration
data.long_summary:
Modified 9 files. (+133/-9 lines). - config

Key changes:
• polaris/src/rubrik/common-go/audits/templates/cdm-host.yml: Added RegisterSecondaryHostFailure audit event template with messaging, status, severity, and syslog configuration.
• polaris/src/rubrik/physicalhost/cmd/flags.go: Added message queue configuration to config struct and initialized it in parseArgs function
• polaris/src/rubrik/physicalhost/cmd/BUILD.bazel: Added dependencies on audits and message-queue libraries to the go_library target

Author: moht-agrawal-rubrik, State: open, Reviewers: 2
action_items: Refactor physicalhost_service.py to use `env_vars = super().env(realm, deployment, config)` and append custom envs as requested.
Respond to Arqum212's question regarding whether a mail and audit are sent for each host failure in primary registration, clarifying the current behavior and any limitations in testing.

data.title: PR #97450: Implement bulk register secondary host rpc
data.long_summary:
Modified 6 files. - config, logic

• polaris/src/rubrik/physicalhost/cmd/BUILD.bazel: Added dependencies on authz-service and cdm-rest-service proto libraries to the go_library target
• polaris/src/rubrik/physicalhost/cmd/flags.go: Added authzServiceAddr and cdmRestSvcAddr fields to config struct and initialized them in parseArgs function
